info.title: Installing Rivendell on an RHEL-7 System

sect2.title: Overview
sect2.para: This technical note contains procedures for installing the Rivendell Radio Automation System on a system running RHEL 7.x derived distributions. Such distributions include:
Installing Rivendell on these platforms consists of three primary steps:

listitem.para: Install the base distribution and establish an Internet connection.
Bootstrap and run the installation script.
Secure accounts and finish up final details.

sect2.title: Prerequisites
sect2.para: The following items are required to complete the installation.

listitem.para: Target hardware. 64 bit (x86_64) AMD or Intel architecture is supported.
A generic installer image for the distribution. DVD, Network and USB installation sources are all supported.
A basic working knowledge of how to install vanilla RHEL 7.x. Consult the documentation of the particular distribution for more information.

sect1.para: Install the base distribution in 'Minimal' mode.
Set the root password, but do not create any other users.
